titles.title: To provide for the rehabilitation of historic structures within the Sandy Hook Unit of Gateway National Recreation Area in the State of New Jersey, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the Monmouth County Vocational School District (or a successor) to permit the use by the District of specified properties for the purpose of developing and operating, without cost to the National Park Service, a secondary school program to be known as the Marine Academy of Science and Technology. Sets forth provisions with respect to: (1) reversion of properties that are not used by the District for a secondary school program; (2) rehabilitation of other property for park uses; and (3) reimbursement of expenses.
